name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, crisp the guanciale in a pan.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, Pecorino Romano, and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving some pasta water. Add pasta to the pan with guanciale.
Remove from heat, then quickly mix in the egg mixture, adding pasta water to create a creamy sauce.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
instructions: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Stir in heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
Whisk in Parmesan cheese until the sauce is smooth.
Add the cooked fettuccine and toss to coat.

name: Chicken Tinga Tostadas
instructions: Poach and shred the chicken breast.
Blend tomatoes, chipotle, and a piece of onion to make the sauce.
Saut√© sliced onions in a pan, then add the sauce and shredded chicken.
Simmer for 10-15 minutes until the flavors combine.
Serve the chicken tinga over crispy tostadas.

name: Chocolate Avocado Mousse
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a high-speed blender or food processor.
Blend until completely smooth and creamy, scraping down the sides as needed.
Taste and adjust sweetness if necessary.
Divide into serving dishes and chill for at least 30 minutes before serving.
